|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, con0), wral(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c3, cpw(con0)), wcel(cdm(c4), c2)))), wcel(cdm(c5), cfv(char, cpw(cxp(c0, c2)))))
-| wceq(c4, coi(cep, c3))
-| wceq(c5, coi(cep, ciun(s0, c0, c3)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wa(wbr(c0, cwdom, c1), wcel(c2, con0)), wral(s0, c0, wa(wcel(c3, cpw(con0)), wcel(cdm(c4), c2)))), wcel(cdm(c5), cfv(char, cpw(cxp(c1, c2)))))
-| wceq(c4, coi(cep, c3))
-| wceq(c5, coi(cep, ciun(s0, c0, c3)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)

comment: Lemma for ~ hsmex . Clear ` I ` hypothesis and extend previous result by dominance. Note that this could be substantially strengthened, e.g., using the weak Hartogs function, but all we need here is that there be *some* dominating ordinal. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 14-Feb-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)
